Code: EXEC SQL SELECT COD_CONVENIO, NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, COD_AGENCIA_DEB, OPER_CONTA_DEB, NUM_CONTA_DEB, DIG_CONTA_DEB, NUM_CARTAO FROM seguros.v0movdebcc_cef WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE GROUP BY COD_CONVENIO, NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, COD_AGENCIA_DEB, OPER_CONTA_DEB, NUM_CONTA_DEB, DIG_CONTA_DEB, NUM_CARTAO END SQL
